g.text: Payer DFSP integration - 2 phase commit - single phase
Lookup Payee Information from Payee DFSP
Add to next phase FSP bulk call
[Quote Processing (M times & within bulkExpiration timelimit in parallel)]
based on both expirySeconds config and
Pass on bulkquote to Payee DFSP
[Transfer Processing (M times & within bulkExpiration timelimit in parallel)]
Confirm Fees meets auto accept levels
Pass on transfer to Payee DFSP
